channel.title: karuna-vijayakumar on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in karuna-vijayakumar on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am an M.Binf student in the Integrative Biology department. I am currently working on my final project that involves comparing OTU clustering thresholds and filtering algorithms in an eDNA metabarcoding dataset under the supervision of Karl Cottenie. Prior to starting my M.Binf at the University of Guelph, I completed a Bachelorâ€™s in Engineering in Information Science from the Visvesvaraya Technological University, Bangalore, India in 2010. Later I completed a M.
